abstract: Vikram S. Pandit, a former chief executive of Citigroup, is betting that a start-up that lends to M.B.A. students and refinances existing debt will be able to compete with the giants of Wall Street.
snippet: Vikram S. Pandit, a former chief executive of Citigroup, is betting that a start-up that lends to M.B.A. students and refinances existing debt will be able to compete with the giants of Wall Street.
lead_paragraph: Vikram S. Pandit has been on the sidelines of the banking industry since resigning as chief executive of Citigroup last October. But with a new investment, Mr. Pandit is betting an upstart lender will be able to compete with the giants of Wall Street.

headline.main: Lending Start-Up CommonBond Raises $100 Million, With Pandit as Investor
